title: A Blockchain-based Model for Securing Data Pipeline in a Heterogeneous Information System. (arXiv:2401.09240v1 [cs.CR])
abstract: In our digital world, access to personal and public data has become an item of concern, with challenging security and privacy aspects. Modern information systems are heterogeneous in nature and have an inherent security vulnerability, which is susceptible to data interception and data modification due to unsecured communication data pipelines between connected endpoints. This re-search article presents a blockchain-based model for securing data pipelines in a heterogeneous information system using an integrated multi-hazard early warning system (MHEWS) as a case study. The proposed model utilizes the inherent security features of blockchain technology to address the security and privacy concerns that arise in data pipelines. The model is designed to ensure data integrity, confidentiality, and authenticity in a decentralized manner. translated_title: 基于区块链的异构信息系统数据管道安全模型
translated_abstract: 在我们的数字世界中，访问个人和公共数据已成为一个关注的焦点，面临着挑战性的安全和隐私问题。现代信息系统具有异构性，并且具有固有的安全漏洞，易受数据拦截和数据修改的影响，这是由于连接端点之间的不安全通信数据管道。本研究文章提出了一种基于区块链的模型，用于使用集成多危险预警系统（MHEWS）作为案例研究来保护异构信息系统中的数据管道。所提出的模型利用区块链技术的固有安全特性来解决数据管道中出现的安全和隐私问题。该模型旨在以分散的方式确保数据完整性、机密性和真实性。该模型在混合环境中使用原型实施和仿真实验进行评估，结果显示它相比传统方法具有一些优势。
tldr: 这个研究提出了一种基于区块链的异构信息系统数据管道安全模型，旨在使用集成的多危险预警系统来解决数据管道中的安全和隐私问题。通过使用区块链的固有安全特性，该模型确保了数据的完整性、机密性和真实性，并通过实验结果证明其相比传统方法具有优势。
en_tdlr: This study proposes a blockchain-based model for securing data pipelines in a heterogeneous information system, focusing on addressing the security and privacy concerns that arise in data pipelines using an integrated multi-hazard early warning system. The model ensures data integrity, confidentiality, and authenticity in a decentralized manner, with experimental results demonstrating its advantages over traditional methods.
